name: Stern Steam Tractor
description: Vehicle Fight is real fun but with this Huge Classic Steam Tractor it is funnest.But driving Steam Tractor is not fun as it is one of the most challenging vehicles around especially when there are so many opponents to test your driving skills to the limit. Drive through amazing arena as you make your way to crushing the other Steam Tractors.Key is to manage your time, and be sure to take advantage of your bonus powers you get on each crush.
